Articles.Content:
[insert AWESOME logo here]

So i made a thread for this idea a while ago, but lots of peopled ignored it and didn't give feed back.

But after i made the first render test video i only got a few replies.

So i have a video to spur on replies

HE'S RUING MY GOOD FLOOR!

Any-who, the basic idea is kind of like a a series of 3D animated videos made and produced by me (and maybe someone who could lend a hand with voice acting from time to time. PM me if you're interesting the voice acting btw)

there are two characters at the moment.

Alex (voiced by built in alex voice available on mac)

and Drew(voiced by me)

And basically... video length will be around 2 minutes each (hopefully)

sometimes i might put out a longer video, sometimes shorter (so don't badger me about it)

Video schedules will be (hopefully) on Wednesdays.

Week 1: kerbal show episode.

week 2: random.. thing

week 3: episode again. (and repeat)

BTW: these will start coming out regularly around next month(ish)

and that's about it...

Edited May 14, 2013 by rewdew2
Decent animation, but otherwise this may look promising. You may want to make the hair more dense though, 'cause it looks like the Kerbal is balding, lol.
He forgot he wasn't in space and can't just leave stuff hanging in mid-air.
Spending all that time orbiting in the KSS really did things to him.

Awe man, i just got the best idea for the next animation.

You'll see it in a week or so,

Edited May 10, 2013 by rewdew2

This is how KSP works in a nutshell.

We take huge ammonts of money, spend them on rockets and then crash them.

Man, this went far back in a few days..

Kind of wish i could get on more.
